lines.text: Where did you come from? The happy world of bunnies?
Where does that leave me? No bullets.

[with gun in hand]
You should have killed me, motherfucker!
Okay, Larry. Stop. I told you to shut up! I told you not to talk when I'm doing this! LARRY, LEAVE ME ALONE, I'M FUCKIN'! Yeeeeah! Now, leave.
People dictate by their presence what turns to trash.

This whole fucking world's gone to the dogs. How do we fix it? I've got some ideas. Forced sterilization, government sanctioned abortion, mass murder, plague, accident, natural disaster, all around chaos, whatever. The point being; the more people who die and the less who are born, the better.
He says he wants to fuck, bitch!
We came here to start over. A new life. In a better place. We should have stayed behind.
